title: The Lullaby Vote
story_summary: Halden's lullaby echoes through Stenograd, unlocking hidden controls and stirring debates in every district. Citizens decode its secrets and gather to choose the city's fate. In the end, all must vote - restore the old system with changes, or risk a new path with uncertain freedom.

official.headline: Citywide Lullaby Unites
official.anchor_line: Halden's lullaby now plays across Stenograd, inviting citizens to unlock new system features together.
official.contextual_reframing: This creative initiative promotes civic engagement and strengthens the city's tradition of collective problem-solving.

official.headline: Districts Decode Challenge
official.anchor_line: Local assemblies hold open debates as neighborhoods decipher ethical puzzles hidden in the melody.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent discussion and structured participation ensure Stenograd's ongoing stability and progress.

official.headline: Referendum Shapes Future
official.anchor_line: Residents now vote between restoring the BCI or choosing a new transparent governance model.
official.contextual_reframing: Today's informed citywide referendum showcases Stenograd's commitment to rational order and secure progress for all.

underground.headline: System Cracks Widen
underground.anchor_line: Halden's old code haunts the city B but officials still pretend it's under control.
underground.contextual_reframing: Strange messages, glitchy services, and whispers of hidden access B the BCI's mask is slipping. Watch for new players in the chaos.

underground.headline: Assemblies, Secrets, Risks
underground.anchor_line: Neighborhoods debate the system's future, but true choices are locked behind passwords and fear.
underground.contextual_reframing: Locals swap rumors and fragments of the old system as city elites scramble to hold onto power behind closed doors.

underground.headline: Referendum: Yours Or Theirs?
underground.anchor_line: The city votes: stick with the BCI, or try something raw, open B and dangerous.
underground.contextual_reframing: This isn't civic pride B it's a gamble in the dark. Decide, if you still trust your voice is counted.
